plot: Wounded yet unyielding, Zoro duels the claw-whirling Meowban Brothers as Nami hunts for Kaya's stolen treasure; Luffy finally snaps awake and catapults through the feline pirates, tipping the battle uphill.

After Luffy and Zoro prevented the Black Cat Pirates in proceeding towards the village. The furious pirates are too worn out in doing their plan. Jango hypnotize his crew to make them strong and invincible. And it really worked as the Black Cat Pirates are now filled with strength and went charging towards their destination. Luffy however was also hypnotized and beaten up the whole crew with his Gum Gum Machine Gun attack. Then he rips off their ship's bow and was about to swing it towards them, right until Jango hypnotized him to sleep. Luffy fell asleep while the bow lands on him and the whole Black Cat Crew. Meanwhile Kaya woke up from a nightmare and finds Merri nearly dead on the floor. She wakes him up to know who did this. He tells her that Klahadore was the one who did this and is a pirate after her treasure. Kaya realized that Usopp was telling her the truth and felt bad for doubting. So she leaves the manor and heads for the coastline. While Usopp's pirate kid trio follows her secretly. Jango who now has an unable crew calls out his ship guards, The Nyaban Brothers: Sham and Buchi. They attack Zoro by getting rid of 2 of his 3 swords which gives him a less greater advantage in winning. How will Zoro be able to defeat the Nyaban Brothers and what will happen when Captain Kuro gets here?—J LeGault
